subject: Sports Injuries
Knees
Alpine Skiing
Olympic Games
World Cup (Skiing)
Weather
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn, recovering from knee surgery, said landing in  loose snow during the super-G event in Schladming, Austria, caused her knee to buckle.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn, recovering from knee surgery, said landing in  loose snow during the super-G event in Schladming, Austria, caused her knee to buckle.
